雲麺: (うんめん) - type of sōmen made without added oil; specialty of Miyagi prefecture, usu. eaten in broth, esp. warm in winter

零れ幸い: (こぼれざいわい) - unexpected piece of good luck; windfall

零れ落ちる: (こぼれおちる) - to spill over and fall; to scatter (petals, leaves, etc.)
零れ話: (こぼればなし) - tidbit; titbit; digression; sidebar; snippet

零点振動: (れいてんしんどう) - zero-point vibration; zero-point motion

零落れる: (おちぶれる) - to be ruined (reduced to poverty); to fall low; to go under; to come to ruin

雷が落ちる: (かみなりがおちる) - to be struck by lightning; to be yelled at (by someone of higher status)/to be scolded harshly
雷さま: (かみなりさま) - thunder; god of thunder
雷に打たれた: (かみなりにうたれた) - thunderstruck; hit by a thunderbolt; struck by lightning

雷名: (らいめい) - fame; renown; great name

雷親父: (かみなりおやじ) - snarling old man; irascible old man
雷酸水銀: (らいさんすいぎん) - mercury fulminate
雷鈷: (らいこ) - ground stone tool from the late Jomon period
雷除け: (らいよけ) - lightning rod/lightning conductor/lightning arrester; charm that protects one from lightning
雷鳥: (ライチョウ) - ptarmigan (Lagopus muta, esp. the Japanese ptarmigan, Lagopus muta japonica); grouse
